Question: Which characters are connected through past relationships in the context provided?
Options:
A. Roma
B. Sameer
C. Rama
D. All of the above

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the relationships between Roma, Sameer, and Suraj Prakash?
Options:
A. a) Roma is Sameer's ex-girlfriend.
B. b) Sameer and Suraj Prakash work together at a lifeguard resort.
C. c) Suraj Prakash has difficulties communicating with his family due to his work schedule.
D. d) Roma is currently dating Suraj Prakash.
Answer: a) Roma is Sameer's ex-girlfriend. and b) Sameer and Suraj Prakash work together at a lifeguard resort. and c) Suraj Prakash has difficulties communicating with his family due to his work schedule.
